contest-event.event-date: Jan. 30, 1977 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Suite Gothique Community Centre, Thornley Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 6 bands competed.
